safire.data.imagenetcorpus module¶

class safire.data.imagenetcorpus.ImagenetCorpus(input, delimiter=None, dim=4096, eps=1e-09, doc2id=None, id2doc=None, gzipped=False, label='')[source]¶

Bases: gensim.interfaces.CorpusABC

The ImgnetCorpus is capable of reading the results of running images through the ImageNet convolutional network, giving out 4096-dim vectors of floats.

Through a set of common document IDs, it’s possible to link the image vectors to text documents in a MultimodalDataset.

get_images()[source]¶

One iteration of get_images should yield one document, which means one line of input.

reset()[source]¶
